heroSection.description: Passionate about leveraging technology to build impactful solutions. With a focus on Web Development, Artificial Intelligence, and Data Science, I’m dedicated to exploring new possibilities and creating innovative applications. Let’s work together to bring exciting ideas to life.

aboutMe.description: Hello! I'm Sarang Mistry, a Computer Science student at the University of Houston, set to graduate in December 2024. My journey in technology is driven by a passion for innovation and a commitment to excellence. I explore various domains, including Web Development, Data Science, and Artificial Intelligence. Beyond coding, I’m a dedicated Tutor at the University of Houston, where I help students master programming concepts and improve their problem-solving skills. I’m excited to apply my skills and knowledge to real-world challenges and contribute to innovative projects. Feel free to explore my portfolio to see some of the work I’ve done and connect with me to discuss potential collaborations or opportunities.

portfolio.title: Contribu
portfolio.description: Designed and developed Contribu, a platform that enables students to collaborate on projects and share ideas seamlessly. With a focus on user experience and inclusivity, the platform was built using Next.js, ShadCN, Tailwind CSS, Supabase, and Resend Email, supporting over 1,000 concurrent users.

portfolio.title: UniMatch
portfolio.description: Developed a Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) chat app that provides detatiled insights about Universities based on user query. Used Python with Beautiful Soup and Requests for web scraping, embedded data with OpenAI, and stored it in Pinecone for efficient semantic search.

portfolio.title: CardGenAI
portfolio.description: Developed a flashcard creation app with manual entry, text generation, PDF uploads, and YouTube links via OpenAI API. Features include a tiered subscription model with Stripe, and it’s built with TypeScript, Firebase for secure authentication and database management, and ShadCN for a modern, responsive UI.

portfolio.title: AI Chat Bot
portfolio.description: Developed a web application where users can chat with AI-powered personalized assistants that act as a nutritionist, personal trainer, and sports coach. The frontend was built using Next JS, Tailwind CSS, and Shadcn, with Supabase handling authentication and database management.

portfolio.title: Fuel Quote Application
portfolio.description: Application that predicts fuel rates based on user criteria. It features a responsive design using Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Authentication is handled with NextAuth.js, while the backend uses Express JS, and Prisma ORM with Vercel Postgres for secure data management.

portfolio.title: Inventory Management System
portfolio.description: Developed an Inventory Management System designed for efficient inventory storage and management. The frontend, crafted with Next.js and Material UI, offers a seamless, user-friendly interface. Integrated Firebase for secure authentication and robust database management, allowing users to easily store, update, and manage their inventory data.
